types.html:
ressources humaines f pl (plural only)

  1. human resources, personnel, staff (personnel employed in an organization)
    département des ressources humaines ― human resources (department)
    gestion des ressources humaines ― human resource management
  2. human resources (personnel department of an organization, dealing with the recruitment, administration, management and training of employees)

Derived terms

[edit]
  • RH

title: ressources humaines
